title: Round Numbers
content:
The Round Numbers indicator plots levels with a step indicated in the settings (in ticks) on the chart.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Step Defines the step size expressed in ticks.
Line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.

Properties
NameDescription
Color
Line style
Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot
Width
